movie.title: Sweatshop
movie.description_intro: Charlie and her friends break into an abandoned warehouse and begin setting up an impromptu party. Unbeknownst to them, something lurks in this dark place... a presence so horrific, so monstrous, it has no name. Fueled by uncontrollable, unprovoked rage, this Beast knows only one thing - Charlie and her companions chose the wrong building, and they're about to pay for it.
movie.description_full: Charlie and her friends break into an abandoned warehouse and begin setting up an impromptu party. movies.title: Paranormal Attraction
movies.summary: Paranormal Attraction tells the dark and sinister tale of a young woman, Sara Myer (Brooklyn Haley), who moves into an abandoned house with a tragic and mysterious past.
movies.description_full: Paranormal Attraction tells the dark and sinister tale of a young woman, Sara Myer (Brooklyn Haley), who moves into an abandoned house with a tragic and mysterious past.
movies.synopsis: Paranormal Attraction tells the dark and sinister tale of a young woman, Sara Myer (Brooklyn Haley), who moves into an abandoned house with a tragic and mysterious past.

movies.title: April Fool's Day
movies.summary: The new "April Fool's" revolves around a party given by two rich siblings for their friend. Tragedy strikes when a friend falls over a balcony and dies. One year later, the teens responsible for the accident become the targets of a twisted killer who begins hunting them down one by one.

One year later, the teens responsible for the accident become the targets of a twisted killer who begins hunting them down one by one.

movies.title: It Stains the Sands Red
movies.summary: This is it. What humanity feared the most is already happening, as a virulent pandemic sweeps the globe from end to end like a pitiless scourge, leaving behind legions of freshly-animated decomposing zombies. Under those circumstances, in the carcass of a levelled Las Vegas, a totally unprepared exotic dancer, Molly, crosses the rugged terrain of the unforgiving desert, driven solely by the will to survive, and a motive even greater than her own life. However, she's not alone. Like a powerful flesh-magnet, Molly attracts a ferocious undead male who is craving for a bite of those fragrant and bright-red offals of hers--and wherever Molly goes, the walking dead predator follows. In the end, do zombies ever get tired?

movies.title: Echoes of Fear
movies.summary: After inheriting her grandfather's house, a young woman must confront the mystery of his sudden death and the evil that hides inside.
movies.description_full: After inheriting her grandfather's house, a young woman must confront the mystery of his sudden death and the evil that hides inside.
